text: Bihistijon duzaxijonro ovoz dihand, ki mo ʙa haqiqat joftem on savoʙi amalhoe, ki Parvardigoramon ʙa mo va'da doda ʙud, ojo sumo niz ʙa haqiqat joftaed on iqoʙi amalhoe, ki Parvardigoraton va'da doda ʙud? Gujand: «Ore». On goh nidodihandae dar mijonason sado dihad, ki la'nati Alloh ʙar kofiron ʙod
